mentors.name: Abdulmalik
mentors.bio: Founder of #Scriptember. Full-stack developer and open-source enthusiast. Passionate about building with modern web technologies.

mentors.name: Grace Hopper
mentors.bio: Pioneering computer scientist and inventor of the first compiler. Expert in system design and low-level programming.

mentors.name: Ada Lovelace
mentors.bio: The first computer programmer, known for her work on the Analytical Engine. Passionate about algorithmic thinking.

mentors.name: John Carmack
mentors.bio: Legendary game programmer and co-founder of id Software. Specialist in 3D graphics, performance optimization, and VR.

mentors.name: Linus Torvalds
mentors.bio: Creator of the Linux kernel and Git. A leading voice in open-source development and version control.

challenges.title: Personal Portfolio Website
challenges.description: Create a beautiful, responsive personal portfolio to showcase your skills and projects. A perfect starting point for new developers.

challenges.title: Markdown Previewer
challenges.description: Build an in-browser markdown editor that shows a live preview of the rendered HTML as you type.

challenges.title: Nostalgic Tamagotchi Clone
challenges.description: Recreate the classic 90s digital pet. Your pet should have needs (hunger, happiness) that change over time, and the user must care for it.

challenges.title: Interactive Data Dashboard
challenges.description: Build a dashboard to visualize a dataset of your choice using shadcn/ui charts. The dashboard should be interactive, allowing users to filter and sort the data.

challenges.title: AI-Powered Recipe Generator
challenges.description: Create an app that generates a recipe based on a list of ingredients a user has. Use Genkit to create the recipe suggestions.

challenges.title: Real-Time Chat Application
challenges.description: Develop a real-time chat application using Firestore. Users should be able to join chat rooms and send messages that appear instantly for all other users in the room.

challenges.title: GitHub Issue Explorer
challenges.description: Connect to the live GitHub API to fetch and display issues from a public repository. Allow users to filter by labels and state (open/closed).

challenges.title: AI-Powered Code Reviewer
challenges.description: Build a tool that uses Genkit to analyze a code snippet and provide suggestions for improvement, such as identifying potential bugs, suggesting refactors, or improving performance.

challenges.title: Collaborative Whiteboard
challenges.description: Create a real-time collaborative whiteboard where multiple users can draw simultaneously. Changes should be synced across all connected clients using Firestore.

challenges.title: Custom shadcn/ui Theme Builder
challenges.description: Build a visual editor that allows users to customize the shadcn/ui theme by changing colors and fonts, and then export the generated CSS variables.

challenges.title: Weather App
challenges.description: Create a simple weather application that fetches and displays the current weather for a user's location or a searched city using a free weather API.

challenges.title: E-Commerce Store Front
challenges.description: Build the front-end of an e-commerce website. Include a product listing page, product detail page, and a shopping cart. Use Firestore to store product data.

challenges.title: AI Story Generator with Images
challenges.description: Use Genkit to write a short story based on a user's prompt. Then, use an image generation model to create an illustration for the story.

schedule.speaker: The Scriptember Team

schedule.speaker: Jane Doe, CEO of OpenTech

schedule.speaker: Community Mentor

schedule.speaker: Firebase Team

schedule.title: Workshop: Mastering Server Actions in Next.js
schedule.speaker: Community Mentor

schedule.title: Talk: Preparing Your Project for Submission
schedule.speaker: The Scriptember Team

teams.name: AI Avengers
teams.projectIdea: Building a platform to generate bedtime stories for kids using Genkit.

teams.name: Data Dynamos
teams.projectIdea: Creating an interactive dashboard for visualizing climate change data.
